languages.text: "Нет, но я знаю, о чем вы. О писанине у него в доме, да? Было дело — у него там появлялись откуда ни возьмись эти надписи. На стенах, на зеркалах — везде это слово, "Покаяние". Я ему советовал найти {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, проверить дом на колдовство, но он отказался. Денег пожалел, поди — он сказал что-то в том духе, что, мол, покаяние ему и так дорого обошлось. Псайкеров мало, за одного просят столько, что можно целый полк отборных головоломов нанять на эти деньги..."

traits.locale_text: "Нет, но я знаю, о чем вы. О писанине у него в доме, да? Было дело — у него там появлялись откуда ни возьмись эти надписи. На стенах, на зеркалах — везде это слово, "Покаяние". Я ему советовал найти псайкера, проверить дом на колдовство, но он отказался. Денег пожалел, поди — он сказал что-то в том духе, что, мол, покаяние ему и так дорого обошлось. Псайкеров мало, за одного просят столько, что можно целый полк отборных головоломов нанять на эти деньги..."

languages.text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."
languages.original_text: "Нет, но я знаю, о чем вы. О писанине у него в доме, да? Было дело — у него там появлялись откуда ни возьмись эти надписи. На стенах, на зеркалах — везде это слово, "Покаяние". Я ему советовал найти {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, проверить дом на колдовство, но он отказался. Денег пожалел, поди — он сказал что-то в том духе, что, мол, покаяние ему и так дорого обошлось. Псайкеров мало, за одного просят столько, что можно целый полк отборных головоломов нанять на эти деньги..."

traits.locale_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — those writings just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and it's all the same word, 'Repentance.' I told him to get a psyker to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, about already having paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, any one of them will run you as much as a whole regiment of elite goons..."

"No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — those writings just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and it's all the same word, 'Repentance.' I told him to get a psyker to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, about already having paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, any one of them will run you as much as a whole regiment of elite goons..."

Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

"No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

languages.text: “没有，但我明白你的意思。你指的就是他家里的涂鸦，是吧？没错，这确实是真的，那些文字突然就那么凭空出现了，无论是墙上，还是镜子上。而且上面写的都是同一个词——忏悔。我让他找个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，检查一下他家里有没有巫术的痕迹，但他说不用，我猜他可能是嫌贵。总之，他提过类似的事情，说他已经为忏悔付出了太多代价。这附近没多少灵能者，每个灵能者开出的价格，都和雇佣一大群顶级打手一样贵……”
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: “没有，但我明白你的意思。你指的就是他家里的涂鸦，是吧？没错，这确实是真的，那些文字突然就那么凭空出现了，无论是墙上，还是镜子上。而且上面写的都是同一个词——忏悔。我让他找个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，检查一下他家里有没有巫术的痕迹，但他说不用，我猜他可能是嫌贵。总之，他提过类似的事情，说他已经为忏悔付出了太多代价。这附近没多少灵能者，每个灵能者开出的价格，都和雇佣一大群顶级打手一样贵……”

languages.text: «No, pero sé a qué se refiere. Los garabatos de su casa, ¿no? Sí, eran reales del todo. La palabra aparecía de la nada en las paredes, en los espejos... siempre la misma: arrepentimiento. Le dije que contratara a un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} para que comprobara si era cosa de hechicería, pero dijo que no. Demasiado dinero, supongo. Dijo algo de eso, como que ya le había salido muy caro el arrepentimiento. No hay muchos psíquicos por aquí, así que uno solo cuesta tanto como un equipo entero de luchadores de máxima categoría...».
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: «No, pero sé a qué se refiere. Los garabatos de su casa, ¿no? Sí, eran reales del todo. La palabra aparecía de la nada en las paredes, en los espejos... siempre la misma: arrepentimiento. Le dije que contratara a un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} para que comprobara si era cosa de hechicería, pero dijo que no. Demasiado dinero, supongo. Dijo algo de eso, como que ya le había salido muy caro el arrepentimiento. No hay muchos psíquicos por aquí, así que uno solo cuesta tanto como un equipo entero de luchadores de máxima categoría...».

languages.text: 「いや、でもなんのことを言っているのかはわかる。あいつの自宅に残されていた落書きだろう？確かにあるな―しかし、なんの前触れもなく現れたんだ。壁にも、鏡にも…いつも『リペンタンス』と、一言だけ書かれていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}に依頼して家に魔術がかけられていないか調べてもらえと伝えたんだが、その必要はないと言われてね。まあ、費用が高すぎたんだろうけど、そんな感じのことを言ってたな。自分が悔い改めるために、既に高い金を払ってしまったと。異能者の数も少ないし、一人に依頼するだけでも一流のケンカ屋を何人も雇えるからな…」
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、でもなんのことを言っているのかはわかる。あいつの自宅に残されていた落書きだろう？確かにあるな―しかし、なんの前触れもなく現れたんだ。壁にも、鏡にも…いつも『リペンタンス』と、一言だけ書かれていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}に依頼して家に魔術がかけられていないか調べてもらえと伝えたんだが、その必要はないと言われてね。まあ、費用が高すぎたんだろうけど、そんな感じのことを言ってたな。自分が悔い改めるために、既に高い金を払ってしまったと。異能者の数も少ないし、一人に依頼するだけでも一流のケンカ屋を何人も雇えるからな…」

languages.text: "Nein, aber ich weiß, wovon Ihr sprecht. Das Gekritzel bei ihm zu Hause, stimmt's? Ja, das war so – diese Schrift ist aus dem Nichts erschienen. Auf den Wänden, den Spiegeln – und immer dasselbe Wort: 'Repentanz.' Ich habe ihm gesagt, er soll sein Haus von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} auf Hexerei untersuchen lassen, aber er wollte nicht. Zu teuer, vermute ich – er sagte so was in der Richtung, dass ihn die Repentanz schon zu viel gekostet habe. Es gibt hier nicht viele Psioniker, und ein einziger kostet so viel wie ein ganzes Team erstklassiger Schläger ..."
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, aber ich weiß, wovon Ihr sprecht. Das Gekritzel bei ihm zu Hause, stimmt's? Ja, das war so – diese Schrift ist aus dem Nichts erschienen. Auf den Wänden, den Spiegeln – und immer dasselbe Wort: 'Repentanz.' Ich habe ihm gesagt, er soll sein Haus von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} auf Hexerei untersuchen lassen, aber er wollte nicht. Zu teuer, vermute ich – er sagte so was in der Richtung, dass ihn die Repentanz schon zu viel gekostet habe. Es gibt hier nicht viele Psioniker, und ein einziger kostet so viel wie ein ganzes Team erstklassiger Schläger ..."

languages.text: « Non, mais je crois savoir de quoi vous parlez. Les gribouillages dans sa maison, c'est ça ? C'était quelque chose, cette histoire. C'est apparu comme ça. Sur les murs, les miroirs, et toujours le même mot : "Repentance". Je lui ai dit de faire appel à un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} pour faire inspecter la maison, au cas où ce serait de la sorcellerie, mais il a refusé. Il devait trouver ça trop cher, il a même dit qu'il avait déjà payé pour sa repentance. C'est vrai que comme il y a assez peu de psykers dans les environs, ils coûtent un bras... »
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: « Non, mais je crois savoir de quoi vous parlez. Les gribouillages dans sa maison, c'est ça ? C'était quelque chose, cette histoire. C'est apparu comme ça. Sur les murs, les miroirs, et toujours le même mot : "Repentance". Je lui ai dit de faire appel à un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} pour faire inspecter la maison, au cas où ce serait de la sorcellerie, mais il a refusé. Il devait trouver ça trop cher, il a même dit qu'il avait déjà payé pour sa repentance. C'est vrai que comme il y a assez peu de psykers dans les environs, ils coûtent un bras... »

languages.text: "Hayır ama neden bahsettiğinizi biliyorum. Evindeki karalamaları diyorsunuz, değil mi? Evet, o olay gerçekten yaşandı. Birden öyle bir yazı belirdi. Duvarlarda, aynalarda hep aynı kelime: 'Tövbe'. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} tutup evine sahirliğe karşı bir baktırtmasını söyledim ama reddetti. Pahalı geldi galiba. Öyle bir şeyler demişti. Zaten tövbeye çok para akıttığından bahsetmişti. Buralarda çok ruhsezer bulunmaz. Tek bir tanesinin parasına bir ordu fedai tutarsın."
languages.original_text: "No, but I know what you're talking about. The scribbles in his home, right? Yeah, it happened, all right — that writing just appeared out of nowhere. On the walls, the mirrors — and always the same word: 'Repentance.' I told him to get a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} to check his house for sorcery, but he said no. Too pricey, I guess — he said something about that, how he had already paid too much for repentance. Not a lot of psykers around, and a single one of them will cost you as much as a team of top-notch bruisers..."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır ama neden bahsettiğinizi biliyorum. Evindeki karalamaları diyorsunuz, değil mi? Evet, öyle bir şey yaşandı. O yazı birden ortalıkta belirdi. Duvarlarda, aynalarda hep aynı kelime: 'Tövbe'. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} tutup evini sahirliğe karşı bir kontrol ettirmesini söyledim ama reddetti. Pahalı geldi sanırım. Zaten tövbe için çok para harcadığını söylemişti. Buralarda çok ruhsezer bulunmaz ve bir tanesi bile birinci sınıf dövüşçülerden oluşan bir takım kadar para eder."
